name: sig-verify-on-midnight
description: Secure document signing on the Midnight Network

scripts.test:mocha: mocha -r ts-node/register 'tests/{unit,integration}/**/*.ts' --reporter spec --colors | tee /dev/tty | grep -o '[0-9]\+ passing\|[0-9]\+ failing' | awk '{printf "\033[32m%s\033[0m\n", $0}'
